support.faqDescription: Find answers to common questions about Play Attention
support.faqQuestion1: What is Play Attention and how does it work?
support.faqAnswer1: Play Attention is a cognitive training program that uses NASA-inspired technology to help improve focus, attention, and executive function. It works by providing real-time feedback during interactive exercises, training your brain to maintain attention.
support.faqQuestion2: How long does it take to see results?
support.faqAnswer2: Most users begin to notice improvements after 8-10 sessions. Consistent practice (2-3 sessions per week) is recommended for optimal results. More significant changes are typically observed after 3-6 months of regular use.
support.faqQuestion3: Is Play Attention suitable for all ages?
support.faqAnswer3: Yes, Play Attention can be beneficial for children (7+), adolescents, and adults. The program adjusts to each user's skill level and provides age-appropriate challenges.
support.faqQuestion4: Do I need any special equipment to use Play Attention?
support.faqAnswer4: The basic requirement is a computer with internet access. The BrainAwareâ„¢ technology works with our specialized hardware that is included with your purchase.
support.faqQuestion5: Can Play Attention replace medication for ADHD?
support.faqAnswer5: Play Attention is not intended to replace medication but can be used as a complementary approach. Many users report improved results when combining Play Attention with their medical treatment. Always consult with a healthcare professional regarding treatment decisions.
